name: githubfetch
description: Github profile information on your terminal
readme_summary: GitHubFetch is a command-line tool that fetches and displays GitHub profile information in a visually appealing format within the terminal. It provides features such as displaying user information, rendering ASCII profile pictures, and visualizing contribution heatmaps, offering a Neofetch-like experience tailored for GitHub profiles.
key_features: Displays GitHub user info (bio, followers, repos, etc.)
primary_use_case: Displaying GitHub profile information in the terminal.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a skilled cartographer meticulously charting a vast, star-filled galaxy onto a sleek, interactive terminal screen. The cartographer uses a telescope connected to the terminal, pulling in data from distant stars (representing GitHub profiles). The terminal beautifully renders each star's information, including its size (number of repositories), brightness (activity), and surrounding constellations (followers/following), all displayed with ASCII art and contribution heatmaps. Subtle code snippets float around the cartographer, and the repository name, 'GitHubFetch,' is subtly etched onto the telescope. The scene is bathed in soft, ethereal light, creating a sense of exploration and discovery. The image should be in a digital painting style with clean lines and clear details.

name: drawdb
description: Free, simple, and intuitive online database diagram editor and SQL generator.
readme_summary: drawDB is a free, browser-based tool for designing database schemas and generating SQL scripts. It allows users to create and customize database diagrams with a user-friendly interface and export SQL scripts for various database systems. The tool aims to simplify database design and visualization without requiring an account.
primary_use_case: Designing and visualizing database schemas and generating corresponding SQL scripts.
cover_image_prompt: An architect meticulously crafting a blueprint for a grand library, each section representing a database table. The architect uses a digital drafting table displaying a user-friendly interface with drag-and-drop elements to connect the sections. SQL code snippets subtly float around the blueprint, transforming the visual design into functional database structures. The library is bathed in soft, natural light, creating a sense of clarity and precision. The scene is in a 3D isometric illustration style with clean lines and labeled parts, emphasizing the intuitive design process.

name: newsnow
description: Elegant reading of real-time and hottest news
readme_summary: NewsNow provides an elegant and real-time news reading experience. It features a clean UI, GitHub OAuth login for data synchronization, caching mechanisms, and adaptive scraping intervals to optimize resource usage. The project also supports MCP server integration for enhanced functionality.
key_features: GitHub OAuth login with data synchronization
primary_use_case: Elegant reading of real-time and hottest news.
cover_image_prompt: A news vendor meticulously curating a vibrant newsstand, arranging headlines from various sources onto a central display. The vendor, wearing a futuristic headset displaying real-time data streams, carefully selects the most relevant and engaging stories. Digital particles flow around the newsstand, representing the constant stream of information. Small UI elements embedded in the stand subtly show filtering and categorization options. The scene is set in a bustling, modern city square with soft, ambient lighting. The image should be in a flat design style with clear iconography and a clean, focused composition.

name: 4gaBoards
description: Straightforward realtime kanban boards management for intuitive task tracking. 4ga Boards features an elegant dark mode, collapsible todo lists, and multitasking tools to supercharge your team's productivity.
readme_summary: 4ga Boards is a straightforward realtime Kanban board system designed for intuitive task tracking and project management. It features an elegant dark mode, collapsible lists, multitasking capabilities, and multiple language support. The platform aims to supercharge team productivity with features like real-time updates, SSO login, and a simplistic design.
primary_use_case: Realtime project management using Kanban boards.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a skilled conductor leading an orchestra where each musician represents a task, and their instruments symbolize different project elements. The conductor's baton is a stylized Kanban board, orchestrating the flow of tasks in real-time. Behind the orchestra, a large screen displays a simplified, elegant dark-mode interface of the 4ga Boards, reflecting the conductor's actions. Subtle digital particles float around the musicians, representing data synchronization and collaboration. The scene is set in a modern, minimalist concert hall with soft, focused lighting. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and clear details.

name: oomd
readme_summary: oomd is a userspace OOM killer designed to prevent system instability caused by out-of-memory errors. It monitors system resources using PSI and cgroupv2, and uses a flexible plugin system to take corrective actions, such as killing processes, before the kernel OOM killer is invoked. This approach allows for customized policies and reduces the risk of system lockups.
key_features: Leverages PSI and cgroupv2 for system monitoring
Flexible plugin system for custom corrective actions
primary_use_case: Preventing kernel-level OOM errors by proactively killing processes in userspace based on system resource monitoring and custom policies.
cover_image_prompt: A doctor in a futuristic hospital triage, swiftly assessing patients (processes) arriving on stretchers (cgroups). The doctor uses a glowing scanner (oomd) to identify patients nearing critical condition (out-of-memory). Patients deemed stable are given a green light, while those in critical condition are quickly moved to a special treatment room (killed). Small UI screens display system resource usage and process health metrics. The scene is set in a clean, brightly lit hospital with a blue and white color scheme. The image should be in a flat design style with clear iconography and subtle digital elements.

name: rezolus
readme_summary: Rezolus is a Linux performance telemetry agent that provides detailed insights into system behavior with low overhead using eBPF. It offers various operating modes, including an agent for continuous metric collection, an exporter for Prometheus integration, a recorder for on-demand analysis, and hindsight for post-incident investigation. Rezolus is designed for performance engineering and DevOps/SRE troubleshooting, providing high-resolution data for in-depth system analysis.
cover_image_prompt: A seasoned detective, magnifying glass in hand, meticulously examines the inner workings of a complex clockwork mechanism representing a server. The clock's gears are labeled with system metrics like CPU, Network, and IO. The detective's focused expression suggests deep analysis of the system's performance. Subtle digital overlays display real-time graphs and data streams emanating from the clockwork. The scene is set in a dimly lit, high-tech workshop with scattered tools and blueprints. The composition is tightly focused on the detective and the clockwork, creating a sense of intense scrutiny. The image should be in a detailed digital painting style with a cool color palette and dramatic lighting.
